p: Immune cells are responsible for the secretion of inflammatory factors. So, decreasing the lymphocyte count might result in CRS suppression. Rituximab, Etoposide, and Lenumab are Mabs used to reduce CD8 + T cells, decrease the release of interferon-gamma, and to treat CRS and hemophagocytic lymphohistiocytosis (FHLH) [124], [125].
